description:
Part of the [Snap Range][], Ryan McKibbin's smart and versatile Snap Chair features clever use of plywood's natural flexibility to create snap-together, interlocking joints for easy tools-free assembly and disassembly. A set of four chairs fits perfectly with the [Snap Table][] for a work or dining arrangement. Each chair can can be put together in a matter of seconds from just six parts. [Snap Range]: /snap [Snap Table]: /snap/snap-table ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/snap/snap-chair/get-it-made) **£310 - 390** from a [maker near you](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/snap/snap-chair/get-it-made) _Of which a proportion supports the designer, and keeps the platform ticking! [(find out more about how it works »)](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works)._ _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
---
#### [Need additional help planning? Opendesk can help! »](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out) [Opendesk can help you](mailto:sales@opendesk.cc) specify designs, visualise your new space, obtain quotes and manage your project from start to finish. All products bought through Opendesk include a 12-month guarantee. Current UK pricing for this product & service (again including support for the designer and platform): **£350** (for two) **[REQUEST CALL BACK](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out)** _This service is only available in the UK at the moment, if you are outside the UK you can connect to a local maker near you. The price is based on recent UK maker quotes. Excludes VAT, delivery and assembly._
name: Snap Chair
